results.name: a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-3) + a(n-4), n >= 4.
comment: See comment and FAMP code for A111569.
program: Floretion Algebra Multiplication Program, FAMP Code: 4ibaseseq[B+H] with B = - .25'i + .25'j - .25i' + .25j' + k' - .5'kk' - .25'ik' - .25'jk' - .25'ki' - .25'kj' - .5e and H = + .75'ii' + .75'jj' + .75'kk' + .75e
